description: Amid the chaos of the French and Indian War, one man’s slow descent into darkness forever shapes the future of the American colonies. Play as Shay Patrick Cormac and transform from a loyal member of the Assassin Brotherhood into the ultimate assassin hunter. Go on a perilous journey through America and the icy cold waters of the Atlantic, taking the perspective of a Templar for the first time in franchise history.
name: Assassin’s Creed® Rogue
